tool_description: Processes family medical history information to identify hereditary risk patterns and genetic predispositions relevant to life insurance underwriting.

family_members.description: List of family member relationships: parent, sibling, grandparent, aunt, uncle, cousin

member_conditions.description: Medical conditions for each family member

member_ages_at_diagnosis.description: Age at diagnosis for each condition (0 if unknown)

member_ages_at_death.description: Age at death for deceased family members (0 if living or unknown)

focus_conditions.description: Specific conditions to focus hereditary analysis on

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: family_members and member_conditions must have the same length.
Invalid relationship: Use valid family relationships [parent, sibling, grandparent, aunt, uncle, cousin].
Invalid age values: Ages must be between 0 and 120, with 0 indicating unknown.
Array length mismatch: If provided, member_ages_at_diagnosis and member_ages_at_death must match family_members length.
usage: Provide family member relationships and their medical conditions. Optionally include ages at diagnosis and death for more precise risk assessment. Returns hereditary risk patterns and genetic predisposition indicators.

hereditary_conditions.description: Medical conditions with apparent hereditary patterns

genetic_risk_factors.description: Identified genetic risk factors based on family history

early_onset_patterns.description: Conditions showing early onset patterns in the family

familial_clustering.description: Whether conditions show significant familial clustering
